Here are shorter bullet points for each food item you listed:

1. Battered Cod Fillets 170-200g:
* Fish fillets coated in a batter and fried
* Cod is a good source of protein and low in fat
* Fillets are convenient and easy to prepare
* Can be served with chips, vegetables, or salad
1. Battered Cod Fillets 230-290g:
* Fish fillets coated in a batter and fried
* Cod is a good source of protein and low in fat
* Fillets are convenient and easy to prepare
* Can be served with chips, vegetables, or salad
1. Bramley Apple & Blackberry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Combination of apples and blackberries in a sweet pie filling
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Blackberries are a good source of fiber and vitamin K
1. Bramley Apple & Blackcurrant Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Combination of apples and blackcurrants in a sweet pie filling
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Blackcurrants are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants
1. Raspberry & Bramley Apple Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Combination of apples and raspberries in a sweet pie filling
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Raspberries are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
1. Bramley Apple Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with apples
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors
1. Black Cherry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with black cherries
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Black cherries are a good source of antioxidants and fiber
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors
1. Blackcurrant Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with blackcurrants
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Blackcurrants are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors

Red Cherry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping 
Strawberry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping 
Cranberry Sauce 
Redcurrant Jelly 
Bramley Apple Sauce 
Mincemeat 
Garlic Puree 
Green Pesto

Here are shorter bullet points for each food item you listed:

1. Red Cherry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with red cherries
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Red cherries are a good source of antioxidants and fiber
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors
1. Strawberry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with strawberries
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Strawberries are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors
1. Cranberry Sauce:
* Condiment made with cranberries and sugar
* Often served with roasted turkey or chicken
* Cranberries are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants
* Can also be used as a spread for sandwiches or toast
1. Redcurrant Jelly:
* Condiment made with redcurrants and sugar
* Often served with roasted meats like lamb or beef
* Redcurrants are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants
* Can also be used as a glaze for desserts or in salad dressings
1. Bramley Apple Sauce:
* Condiment made with Bramley apples and sugar
* Often served with roasted pork or turkey
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Can also be used as a topping for oatmeal or yogurt
1. Mincemeat:
* Sweet mixture of dried fruit, spices, and sometimes alcohol
* Often used as a filling for pies and tarts
* Can include ingredients like raisins, currants, and citrus peel
* Popular during the winter holidays
1. Garlic Puree:
* Condiment made with garlic cloves
* Can be used as a flavoring in a variety of dishes
* Adds a strong garlic flavor without the texture of chopped garlic
* Convenient and easy to use in recipes
1. Green Pesto:
* Sauce made with basil, pine nuts, garlic, and cheese
* Can be used as a topping for pasta or as a spread for bread
* Adds a rich, herbaceous flavor to dishes
* Can also be used as a marinade or dipping sauce

Real Mayonnaise 
Real Mayonnaise 
Light Mayonnaise 
Light Mayonnaise 
Easy Cook Long Grain Rice 
Easy Cook Basmati Rice 
Scone Mix 
Fish Batter Mix

Here are shorter bullet points for each food item you listed:

1. Real Mayonnaise:
* Creamy, tangy condiment made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Adds richness and flavor to dishes
* Made with high-quality ingredients
1. Real Mayonnaise:
* Creamy, tangy condiment made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Adds richness and flavor to dishes
* Made with high-quality ingredients
1. Light Mayonnaise:
* Lower-fat version of traditional mayonnaise
* Made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Provides a lighter option with the same tangy flavor
1. Light Mayonnaise:
* Lower-fat version of traditional mayonnaise
* Made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Provides a lighter option with the same tangy flavor
1. Easy Cook Long Grain Rice:
* Type of rice with long, slender grains
* Easy to cook and versatile
* Can be used in a variety of dishes, like stir-fries, pilafs, and more
* Provides a good source of energy and some vitamins and minerals
1. Easy Cook Basmati Rice:
* Fragrant type of rice with long, slender grains
* Easy to cook and versatile
* Often used in Indian and Middle Eastern cuisine
* Provides a good source of energy and some vitamins and minerals
1. Scone Mix:
* Mix for making scones, a type of pastry
* Includes flour, sugar, and other dry ingredients
* Can be customized with added ingredients like fruit or chocolate chips
* Easy to prepare and bake
1. Fish Batter Mix:
* Mix for making batter for fish
* Includes flour, seasoning, and other dry ingredients
* Provides a crispy, golden coating for fish fillets
* Easy to prepare and cook

Brown Sauce 
Tartare Sauce 
Mint Sauce 
Horseradish Sauce 
Sticky BBQ Sauce 
French Dressing 
Salad Cream 
English Mustard

Here are shorter bullet points for each food item you listed:

1. Brown Sauce:
* Condiment with a tangy, slightly sweet flavor
* Made with molasses, vinegar, and spices
* Often served with breakfast foods like bacon or sausages
* Can also be used as a marinade or dipping sauce
1. Tartare Sauce:
* Condiment with a tangy, creamy flavor
* Made with mayonnaise, pickles, and other seasonings
* Often served with fish and seafood dishes
* Can also be used as a spread or dip for vegetables
1. Mint Sauce:
* Condiment with a fresh, tangy flavor
* Made with chopped mint leaves, vinegar, and sugar
* Often served with lamb dishes
* Can also be used as a dressing for salads or a marinade for chicken
1. Horseradish Sauce:
* Condiment with a pungent, spicy flavor
* Made with grated horseradish root, vinegar, and other seasonings
* Often served with roast beef or steak
* Can also be used as a dip for vegetables or a spread for sandwiches
1. Sticky BBQ Sauce:
* Condiment with a sweet, smoky flavor
* Made with tomatoes, molasses, and other seasonings
* Often used as a marinade or glaze for meat dishes
* Can also be used as a dip for vegetables or a spread for sandwiches
1. French Dressing:
* Salad dressing with a tangy, slightly sweet flavor
* Made with oil, vinegar, and seasonings like mustard and herbs
* Can be used as a dressing for salads or as a marinade for chicken or fish
* Provides a lighter option compared to creamy dressings
1. Salad Cream:
* Condiment with a tangy, slightly sweet flavor
* Similar to mayonnaise but with a thinner consistency
* Often used as a dressing for salads or a spread for sandwiches
* Provides a lighter option compared to traditional mayonnaise
1. English Mustard:
* Condiment with a pungent, spicy flavor
* Made with ground mustard seeds, vinegar, and other seasonings
* Often served with meats and sausages
* Can also be used as a marinade or dipping sauce
